meanings.definition: The time set aside for telling stories.
meanings.sent1: During storytime, children gather to listen to tales.
meanings.sent2: Every library has a designated storytime for kids.
meanings.sent3: At storytime, the little ones are always eager to hear what happens next.
meanings.sent4: In the magical world of storytime, anything is possible.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller made storytime come alive with vivid descriptions.

meanings.definition: A period of time during which stories are read or told.
meanings.sent1: Bedtime is my favorite storytime with my kids.
meanings.sent2: The school's storytime usually lasts for thirty minutes.
meanings.sent3: During storytime, the cat always curls up next to us.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet of storytime, the words painted pictures in our minds.
meanings.sent5: The cozy blanket added to the warmth of storytime by the fireplace.

meanings.definition: A scheduled event at which stories are read or told.
meanings.sent1: The library's storytime is every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: Parents often bring snacks for their kids to enjoy during storytime.
meanings.sent3: During storytime, the storyteller's funny voices always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the community center's storytime, everyone feels like part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The park's outdoor storytime was filled with sunshine and laughter.
